Cheltenham Festival Day 4 - JCB Triumph Hurdle Odds

The JCB Triumph Hurdle is the first race on day 4 of the Cheltenham Festival and it really is a great way to start the card on Friday, it is shaping up to be a cracking renewal this year with some really good hurdlers set to take their chances. This is a race always worth watching as we always see some future stars of the National Hunt game, we have had winners of the class as Zarkandar and Celestial Halo in recent years and they have gone onto bigger things.
